service_post.title: Will my website be mobile friendly?
service_post.content: Most definitely. We make sure your website is fully responsive and doesn’t break any resolution.

service_post.title: Can the design be made according to my preference?
service_post.content: Yes, the design will be made keeping your preference and choice in mind so that we can deliver the best results.

service_post.title: I have a strict budget, do you have any low-cost plan?
service_post.content: We understand the importance of a website today thus, we have a budget plan for every business from new to established.

service_post.title: What if I am not happy with the design?
service_post.content: If you are not satisfied with the design, we redesign the website according to your preference and your choice. We also have a large collection of design templates for you to choose from.

service_post.title: Can we schedule a call to discuss my app idea and understand your technical capabilities?
service_post.content: Yes, we are available for a call or email to discuss your app idea, whatever seems convenient to you.

service_post.title: I have a website, can you build an app for the same?
service_post.content: Yes, we can easily develop an app for your website. We use cloud databases so the data will be synchronized across your website and mobile app as well.

service_post.title: Do you develop code applications as well?
service_post.content: Yes, we do. Along with experienced designers we also have an entire team of professional developers and full-stack developers to build the application.

service_post.title: Do you use templates in your designs?
service_post.content: Yes and No. We have an enormous library of template designs available. If the client wants something similar, we choose from it. Otherwise, we create the entire design from scratch.

service_post.title: Can you make functional prototypes and wireframes?
service_post.content: Most definitely. Creating functional prototypes and wireframes is the first thing that we do before diving into development.

service_post.title: What tools do you use for UX design?
service_post.content: We use Figma and Adobe XD mostly. We also prepare sketches with just pen and paper which might sound primitive but it’s effectiveness cannot be denied.

service_post.title: What is the timeline for UX design?
service_post.content: UX Design timeline of a project depends on the scope, project goals and priorities of key stakeholders involved. It could be done on a single stretch or as phases.

service_post.title: Can you convert the design to WordPress, HTML, or CSS?
service_post.content: We certainly can. We provide website design and web development services individually or you can get the whole package which does the UX designing and converts that to a live website.

service_post.title: What software do you use for prototyping?
service_post.content: For prototyping, we use Sketch, XD, Figma etc. whichever is suitable for the project.

service_post.title: How long can it take to complete the prototyping process?
service_post.content: Basic prototypes can be developed in as little as 2–4 weeks depending on the simplicity. Once all the stakeholders are satisfied with the prototype, the next stage is to start building out the MVP (minimum viable product).

service_post.title: Do you create interactive prototypes?
service_post.content: Yes. The level of interactivity increases along with the reliability of the prototype.

service_post.title: I am not a technical person, will you be able to provide detailed guidelines?
service_post.content: Of Course. We will provide you with detailed instructions on how to use the applications.

service_post.title: Can you help me write content for my presentation, speech, or pitch?
service_post.content: Sure. We can prepare your speech or pitch as well as the whole presentation.

service_post.title: I want an animation in my slides, can you provide some animations to make the presentation more engaging?
service_post.content: We surely can. We provide smooth animations and use custom graphical elements to make your presentation more engaging.

service_post.title: Can you build me a template so that I can use it in future projects?
service_post.content: Yes. We can build just the template of the presentation for you.

service_post.title: I want my presentation on Mobile/Tablet/Smartphone. Can you design a presentation for that?
service_post.content: Yes. We can create presentation slides for your other devices as well.

service_post.title: Which platform do you use to develop the website?
service_post.content: We use modern technologies like Laravel, NodeJS, AngularJS and many more which are appropriate for fulfilling the design and functional requirements of the website.

service_post.title: Is there any hidden cost associated with the service?
service_post.content: No, there are no hidden costs involved. We are an honest and transparent digital agency and the services we provide reflect that.

service_post.title: Can you help with an existing website?
service_post.content: Yes! We work on existing websites but we recommend building the site from one source only as it ensures the stability of the website’s performance.

service_post.title: I already have a website that needs updating. Can you help?
service_post.content: Yes, we will update your existing website as per your requirements.

service_post.title: What types of apps do you develop?
service_post.content: We develop apps for both Web and Mobile platforms.

service_post.title: Is it necessary for me to test my app?
service_post.content: We have an in-house testing team that will work with the developers to validate the device. Your feedback is very important to ensure the best quality for the app.

service_post.title: What if I need assistance on the app after it is launched?
service_post.content: We provide help with maintaining the app after it is launched to help you to be onboard and take control.

service_post.title: Will I own the source code?
service_post.content: Yes. After the development process is complete, we will provide you the source code if you need it.

service_post.title: Do you develop an ecommerce application?
service_post.content: Yes. We develop different kinds of e-commerce sites according to your preference.

service_post.title: Do you provide special software to manage my ecommerce website?
service_post.content: Yes. We can set up a CMS (Control Management System) for your site if you don’t have one to manage your website.

service_post.title: I am not a technical person, will you manage my ecommerce site?
service_post.content: Yes. We are happy to manage your site and help you understand the technicalities.

service_post.title: How much does it cost to develop an ecommerce app?
service_post.content: The cost will depend on the technical requirements and specifications, the tools to be used etc and will be customized according to your budget.

service_post.title: Are the contents unique and original that you write?
service_post.content: Yes, all contents are unique and plagiarism free. We use specialized tools to check these.

service_post.title: Do you provide content writing for websites?
service_post.content: Yes, we certainly do. We provide an engaging text for your entire website if you need it.

service_post.title: Do you provide content writing for social media and blogs?
service_post.content: Yes, we do. With these, we also write PR, speech and other copies.

service_post.title: Don’t content writers work for advertising agencies?
service_post.content: Yes, but we are an all-inclusive digital agency, equipped with all the skills and technologies to assist you and drive growth for your business.

service_post.title: What kind of contents do you create for social media?
service_post.content: We create text, Image, video, animation, infographics and any other contents that supports social media.

service_post.title: Do you provide content for all social media?
service_post.content: Yes, we provide content for all social media as per your requirements.

service_post.title: Do you promote or boost social media posts?
service_post.content: Yes, we can promote and boost your social media account.

service_post.title: How soon can I expect to see social media growth?
service_post.content: The rate of growth is much faster in the early days – nearly 50% of growth happens within 10 days of Page creation.

service_post.title: Do you offer photo editing services as well?
service_post.content: Yes, in our artistic style, we use traditional color grading, cropping out distracting components, pitch, and sharpness. We also curate the images to your style, ensuring that the album has a consistent look and feel. Other than that, we also provide professional retouching service.

service_post.title: Can I have all the raw and edited photos as well?
service_post.content: One collection of files will be delivered in raw format , which is ideal for archiving and storing. Some people use them for printing as they are. You'll also get the package of edited files that are ready for your business or social sharing.

service_post.title: Are you willing to travel a long distance for photography if required?
service_post.content: Yes, we will cover any location to complete your project.

service_post.title: Can you provide video files for online use?
service_post.content: Yes. We can create motion graphics for your business or promotional video.

service_post.title: Do we need to visit your studio for the project?
service_post.content: It depends. If needed we will inform you to visit our studio.

service_post.title: What is the final output for your animation?
service_post.content: We generally provide mp4 format but we can arrange in another format if you need.

service_post.title: If I have a set amount of budget, will you be able to work with me?
service_post.content: Yes, we will work with your set amount.

service_post.title: How soon can we start the promotion?
service_post.content: Usually we can start immediately. But if you need any technical adoption then it can take a bit of time.

service_post.title: What do you need from me to get started?
service_post.content: We need to understand the marketing strategy of your business. We also plan the promotions according to your preference and budget. If you don’t have any preference, then we will create some promotional campaigns for you. If you like those then we can get started.

service_post.title: When is the best time to run a sales promotion?
service_post.content: It totally depends on you. But we suggest having it right at launch when early converts are looking for more information. And where early converts can share their experiences.

service_post.title: What are the file formats that you accept?
service_post.content: You will be the owner of the designed model. We will provide you with the design along with all the files and resources if you need.

service_post.title: Can you guarantee the security of my 3D project?
service_post.content: Your data is 100% secured with us.

service_post.title: How do I track the progress of the project?
service_post.content: We are very transparent. We will remain in touch with you throughout the course of the entire project and you check the progress every step of the way.

service_post.title: Who owns the model after it is complete?
service_post.content: You will be the owner of the designed model. We will provide you with the design along with all the files and resources if you need.

service_post.title: Do you offer different SEO packages?
service_post.content: Yes we offer different SEO packages. You can choose what suits you best. And also you can go for a custom plan according to your requirements.

service_post.title: How quickly can I expect to see the result?
service_post.content: It depends on many factors like, Keywords competition, Search Engine Algorithm trend, Content trend and some others. It can take 3 to 4 month to get a visible change.

service_post.title: How often can I expect to see the reports?
service_post.content: You will get an analytics and activity report according to the package you subscribe to.

service_post.title: Do we have to give you access to our social media accounts?
service_post.content: Yes, it may be required depending on the situation.

service_post.title: Do you have any packages for social media marketing?
service_post.content: Yes, we do have packages but we do customization as per client requirements.

service_post.title: What can you do to target my audience specifically?
service_post.content: We will target the audience based on your requirements and our research analysis.

service_post.title: What kind of content will work for our industry?
service_post.content: It can be promotional speech, video, images, animation, infographic, PR and more.

service_post.title: How do you promote the content that you will be creating?
service_post.content: We will promote your content on the popular web and social channels to reach maximum audiences.

service_post.title: Can you do audience research for my niche as well?
service_post.content: Yes, we will do the audience research based on your requirements and target market.

service_post.title: What's a standard conversion rate?
service_post.content: A good conversion rate is above 10%.

service_post.title: For what kind of conversions do you work?
service_post.content: We work on every conversion that can be achieved online.

service_post.title: How do I improve my conversion rate?
service_post.content: There are many ways to do this, however, the most effective way is by optimizing your online platforms in accordance to the preferences of your customer base. In this case you can take support from a website development company in Bangladesh.

service_post.title: What are the best Digital Marketing Strategies?
service_post.content: It varies on your business goals. Digital Marketing Strategies include a series of activities to achieve your business goal through paid, organic, and owned media.

service_post.title: How does a digital strategy perform?
service_post.content: A digital strategy always takes a Data-Driven Approach that helps in achieving goals in the given period of time.

service_post.title: What services are included in Digital strategy?
service_post.content: Various online activities like SEO, Content Marketing (Blogging & Article Writing), Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, PPC, Video Production, Website Design & Development, Public Relations (PR).

service_post.title: Will my financial data be safe in the cloud?
service_post.content: We give a 100% guarantee that all of your data will be safe and secure and no harm will come to it.

service_post.title: How frequently do you backup our data?
service_post.content: We generally do a monthly backup but if you need frequent backups we can do that as well.

service_post.title: Will I be taken offline during a scheduled maintenance on the server?
service_post.content: No. We will transfer your site to another server location so that your site can have the highest up time.

service_post.title: Will it be hard to maintain the database after the handover of the project?
service_post.content: Absolutely not. We will make sure that you will have no complications with the database management and provide you with the proper instructions.

service_post.title: Will my data be safe?
service_post.content: Dcastalia guarantees that all your data will be safe and no harm will come to it.

service_post.title: Do you perform database testing?
service_post.content: If you want your current database to be tested for bugs or errors we can certainly do that.

service_post.title: Will I be able to keep track of my entire team?
service_post.content: Yes, you will be able to keep track of the entire team and also monitor the progress of each task assigned to them.

service_post.title: Can the application be customized according to my requirements?
service_post.content: The app is designed to fit all your requirements but if you require some additional features, we can implement that as well.

service_post.title: I have more than 1000 employees. Will the system be able to handle that large amount?
service_post.content: The number of your employees doesn't matter. The system will be able to handle any amount of employees and assist you with your team management tasks.

service_post.title: How do I know that I need Web Maintenance?
service_post.content: It is said that prevention is better than cure. If your website remains without maintenance then it will soon slow down and will have a negative impact on search results and soon it might break. So we suggest that you perform regular maintenance on your website as soon as it is launched.

service_post.title: How long does it take to complete website maintenance on my website?
service_post.content: Performing website maintenance is a continuous process. Since the creation of a website, it must go through proper maintenance to function properly. So there is no definite time stamp when your web maintenance will be complete.

service_post.title: Can I upgrade or downgrade my web maintenance plan?
service_post.content: Sure you can. If you want to upgrade/downgrade your maintenance package you can do it whenever you want.

service_post.title: How can I secure the devices in my company without degrading the user experience (UX)?
service_post.content: Usually performing security scans on a website breaks certain UX elements. With Advanced peer-to-peer based technologies you can detect and remediate vulnerabilities with zero impact on the UX.

service_post.title: Can you provide SSL certificates for my website?
service_post.content: Yes, we certainly can. Without SSL certification your website will be vulnerable, for this reason we provide SSL certificates on your website.

service_post.title: Will my website be protected from the broken perimeter?
service_post.content: Dcastalia delivers your website from the cloud and lets you restore your security perimeter by providing always-on security that follows the user, regardless of location.

service_post.title: With increasing inspection demands, how can you keep my website safe?
service_post.content: With multiple inspection technologies, you get a fully integrated security stack from us with full SSL inspection that never runs out of capacity.

service_post.title: Do you perform WordPress website optimization?
service_post.content: Yes, we provide full WordPress website optimization for you.

service_post.title: Will you provide code and database profiles so that I can see what’s slowing down my website?
service_post.content: Yes. We identify the portion of codes or blockages that is slowing your website down. We can also provide you with your codes and database profiles and point out the things that were causing the decrease in speed.

service_post.title: Can you minify the images on my website?
service_post.content: Yes we can. Minifying images increases your website load speed. We use javascript and photo manipulation to reduce the size and keep the quality intact as much as possible.

service_post.title: What tools do you use for web optimization?
service_post.content: We use tools such as Google page speed insight, Webpage test, KeyCDN Optimus API and other tools such as Grunt, Gulp, ImageAlpha (For Mac).

service_post.title: Can I connect to the server using the server name?
service_post.content: To connect to the server from outside of the server’s local network, you need to configure an A record in Cloud DNS. To access Cloud DNS, in the top navigation bar of the Cloud Control Panel, select Networking > Cloud DNS.

service_post.title: Can I upgrade my server later?
service_post.content: Sure you can. If you have a general purpose server you can Increase available storage with Cloud Block Storage or Migrate to a larger size server with more RAM, disk space, and vCPUs

service_post.title: What do I enter in the server name field?
service_post.content: The name that you enter when you create a server is used as the server’s host name. It helps you identify this server in the API and Cloud Control Panel.

service_post.title: Do you have a control Panel?
service_post.content: Yes, DCASTALIA provides you with a web-based management interface for restarting your Cloud Server

service_post.title: What kind of security actions can I expect?
service_post.content: Firewall, DDoS protection, rate limiting, bot management, VPN, and more

service_post.title: I work in a network environment. How can I protect my devices and my team?
service_post.content: You can protect your device and your team through CloudFlare Access and CloudFlare Gateway applications.

service_post.title: Won’t applying CloudFlare increase my web maintenance efforts?
service_post.content: No. Since there are no VMs, no servers, and no containers to spin up or manage you can spend more time on building and less time on configuring.

service_post.title: Who governs all your training programs?
service_post.content: Our Product Manager works directly with Subject Matter Experts that select and compile the content for our training manuals.

service_post.title: Can I customize the training materials?
service_post.content: Yes. If you want, you can customize our training materials.

service_post.title: Does my team need to improvise or act as a part of your training?
service_post.content: No. We have designed our training model in such a way that you don’t have to improvise or act as a part of our team but if you want you are most certainly welcome to do so.

service_post.title: I already have a website that needs updating. Can you help?
service_post.content: Yes, we will update your existing website as per your requirements.

service_post.title: Do you create a WordPress site also?
service_post.content: Yes, we do. We design your WordPress website and optimize it as well. We can fix your HTML, CSS, ASP, PHP etc. If you need plugin customization, we can help you with that too.

service_post.title: Can you design a mobile browser app?
service_post.content: Yes, we do. We build powerful mobile browser apps using the latest technology called PWA (Progressive Web Apps).

service_post.title: What are the resources that clients need to provide?
service_post.content: A prospective client must present their organisational goals, functional requirements and technical specifications.

service_post.title: What are the UX design deliverables?
service_post.content: A UX designer produces user-research reports, user persona, customer journey map, sitemaps, wireframes, UI sketch and an interactive prototype.

service_post.title: Is rapid prototyping the same as 3d printing?
service_post.content: Rapid prototyping and 3D printing are often mistaken as synonyms, but they are not the same. Rapid prototyping is an application of additive manufacturing, while 3D printing is a form of additive manufacturing. 3D printing is a relatively recent and less expensive form of additive manufacturing.

service_post.title: What does it cost to develop an app?
service_post.content: The cost will depend on the technical requirements and specifications, the technology to be used etc. and will be customized according to your budget.

service_post.title: Do you provide custom designs for e-commerce developments?
service_post.content: Yes. All the designs will be uniquely made just for you according to your design requirements.

service_post.title: Will the service be halted during maintenance of the server?
service_post.content: No. We will transfer your site to another server location so that your site can have the highest up time.

service_post.title: Can you provide database applications for desktop applications?
service_post.content: Yes, we do provide database applications for desktop applications.

service_post.title: Will I be able to add timings to my app?
service_post.content: Yes you will be able to add all the timings specifically.

service_post.title: Will the app be too complicated for the employees?
service_post.content: No. The app will have a very easy navigation system

service_post.title: How do you select relevant keywords for a business? Do you engage clients in this activity?
service_post.content: Yes we do. We send the keywords to the clients for approval and we also take their feedback.

service_post.title: Do you have any specific SEO strategy?
service_post.content: Yes we do, but we customise our strategy according to the client’s specifications.

service_post.title: What sort of social media marketing services do you exactly provide?
service_post.content: We do marketing for the platforms Facebook and LinkedIn.

service_post.title: Do you offer ad posts for social media marketing?
service_post.content: Yes, we do provide ad posts for social media marketing.

service_post.title: Why is it important to have a digital strategy?
service_post.content: Having a strategy outlines and creates a clear path to your goals. It streamlines activities necessary to undertake in order to achieve your desired outcome.

service_post.title: What are the key elements that you take into account while developing a digital strategy for your client?
service_post.content: We observe the industry the client is operating in. Since, with every industry the customer base changes so does the competitors and the mode of conducting the business, we put great emphasis on industry based research to come up with the most effective solution.

service_post.title: How do you ensure the content that you are creating is relevant to my business?
service_post.content: We do in depth research on the topics provided by our clients and then start writing the content for it.

service_post.title: Do you have any dedicated content marketing plan?
service_post.content: We do have a dedicated content marketing plan for our clients.

service_post.title: Is click-through-rate and conversion rate the same?
service_post.content: CTR is a metric that measures how many people clicked your ad to visit a website or landing page, however a conversion rate shows how many website or app visitors complete an action out of the total number of visitors.

service_post.title: Which digital platform would be the most effective for my business?
service_post.content: Every digital platform serves distinctive marketing objectives. However, it solely depends on the industry you are operating in and your business strategy.

service_post.title: Do you provide the short-form or long-form content?
service_post.content: We provide both short and long-form contents.

service_post.title: Will you provide after-sales services to update my digital platform? If so, how many times?
service_post.content: We do provide maintenance and support services after sales based on different packages that we have developed for your needs.

service_post.title: How do you measure the ROI generated from each digital marketing platform?
service_post.content: We calculate using the leads generated from your digital platforms. Accordingly, we convert them to quantitative data.

service_post.title: What is the process that you use to provide digital marketing services to your clients?
service_post.content: Our approach varies from industry to industry and service to service. However, one similarity that we hold for every client and the provision of every service is rigorous research and analysis.

service_post.title: How should I begin with website maintenance services?
service_post.content: Tell us what needs to be changed, and we'll take care of it for you. It's really that simple; a project manager will keep you informed. We will notify you once the work is finished so that you can review the changes and ensure that everything is done to your satisfaction. That's the only thing there is to it! We handle everything so you can concentrate on what's important.

service_post.title: Can I make website maintenance changes on my own?
service_post.content: This is determined by the sort of website you have. If your website does not allow you to, we will explore options for converting it to a CMS (Content Management System).

service_post.title: Why should I back up my website, and how many times should I do so?
service_post.content: You can maintain backups of your website regularly so that if it crashes due to threats, an earlier version can be restored and any bugs can be addressed.

service_post.title: Can you make me an interactive presentation which includes animations?
service_post.content: Yes, we can build an animated presentation using Microsoft PowerPoint .However, when it comes to animating text or objects, presentation software has limitations. We are always open and can be frank with you on what you should expect in terms of the animation you want.

service_post.title: How can we deal with technical problems at the event?
service_post.content: Photographers have at least two advanced camera bodies, multiple lenses, and a range of shoot-specific accessories. We carry well-maintained equipment to prevent any mishap during the day of shoot.

service_post.title: What are my rights to the digital prints?
service_post.content: You have the freedom to reprint photos at any time. However, you can not sell or publish your photographs for profit without the written permission of Dcastalia.

service_post.title: What type of design solutions can you provide me?
service_post.content: We are happy to provide design solutions for any stage of your business project according to your requirements be it: prototyping, web and app designing, UX design, business presentations as well as traditional designs.

service_post.title: How do I collaborate with you to develop a product?
service_post.content: Contact us via our online form, e-mail, or phone if you have an idea. We will soon arrange a meeting with you to discuss it. Before the meeting, help us by preparing as much information about your proposal as possible; this will make the meeting go more smoothly and benefit future collaborations.

service_post.title: How long would it take for you to design my product?
service_post.content: The design process depends on the project scope and the requirements. After that, considering the budget, we can give an estimated time.

service_post.title: What methods do you use to ensure product quality?
service_post.content: We review the results, test our work , show it to you and incorporate your input so you know you are getting what you paid for.

service_post.title: Can prototypes and demo models be created for me to try out as part of the development process?
service_post.content: Yes absolutely, prototypes and demos are created as per our development process for user testing. So you will be able to use them and provide feedback.

service_post.title: Will you be able to upgrade an existing software? What do I have to provide?
service_post.content: Sure we can. We need the codes and all the files of your previous project and we can upgrade it as per your requirements.

service_post.title: Will our information be secure?
service_post.content: Yes, your data is completely safe and protected, and only the people you choose from inside your company have access to it. Apart from that, the data is stored in databases and transmitted between the server and your computer in an encrypted format. To ensure this, several security audits and assessments will be conducted.

service_post.title: Would I need to make any changes to my existing systems for business automation?
service_post.content: Yes, you can upgrade your current system to use automation. We need the codes and all the files of your previous project and we can upgrade it as per your requirements.

service_post.title: What should I expect as a result of introducing Business Automation?
service_post.content: Although the results differ depending on the type of implementation, processes involved and department, productivity is the most significant driving force behind any Business Automation implementation. However, according to experience and research, you can predict the following outcomes: – Lower costs – Higher productivity – Consistent output

service_post.title: Do you do business automation for e-commerce websites?
service_post.content: Yes, we do business automation for all kinds of e-commerce websites.

service_post.title: Does the database application development service include a data analytics tool?
service_post.content: We can definitely add a Data Analytics tool depending on your project goal and budgeting as per discussion.

service_post.title: What is the difference between content creation and content marketing? Aren’t both the same thing?
service_post.content: No, they have different meanings. Content creation is the process of creating valuable and engaging content for your audience, whereas content marketing is the process of distributing those content to audiences for visibility and engagement.

service_post.title: How long does it take to create a content?
service_post.content: This completely depends on the service you are taking, the quantity and your requirements.

service_post.title: How do you offer these services? Do you have any packages?
service_post.content: Yes, we have different packages for each of the services we provide for content creation.

service_post.title: Do you develop VR games?
service_post.content: Yes, we can develop VR games for you.

service_post.title: What is API ?
service_post.content: Application Programming Interface (API) is a set of instructions, standards, or requirements that allows a program or app to use features/services from another app, platform, or device in order to provide better service. In a nutshell, it's a feature that allows apps to connect with one another.

service_post.title: Why is API so important?
service_post.content: An API serves as the foundation for all programs that deal with data or allow interactions among two products or services. It enables a mobile application or platform to exchange information with other apps/platforms and improve user experience without requiring developers.

service_post.title: Which platform should I choose if I want to make an IOS and an android application?
service_post.content: The platform you choose is entirely based on the concept of your future app and its intended audience. Each platform has its own strategy for generating revenue. In-app purchases and premium apps are more used by Apple users. Despite the fact that Android users are in greater numbers, they are less inclined to pay for app installation and prefer to utilize free apps.

service_post.title: What is WordPress?
service_post.content: WordPress is a blogging and content management system that is open source and was released in 2003. It is now the most widely used blogging platform on the internet and its CMS powers over 35% of websites in the internet

service_post.title: Is WordPress Secure?
service_post.content: WordPress is updated four to eight times a year, which is more frequently than typical software. Regular updates improve the security of WordPress websites and ensure that the most recent version is used.

service_post.title: Can I easily edit everything in WordPress?
service_post.content: WordPress has been created with non-technical users in mind. Changing font sizes and colors, altering navigation, building new web pages, incorporating photos, and embedding video are all simple tasks with this CMS. To take it a step further, Dcastalia provides each customer with a personalized website manual and free consulting that contains precise "how-tos" for upgrading the WordPress website once it has been developed.

service_post.title: What kind of license does WordPress have?
service_post.content: The General Public License (GNU) is used to license WordPress. This is an open-source license, which means anyone can edit and redistribute the source code.

service_post.title: What is DevOps?
service_post.content: DevOps is a software development process that builds a bridge between the development team and the operations team for continuous and rapid delivery.

service_post.title: How can a business benefit from DevOps?
service_post.content: DevOps technique enables faster and more effective product delivery with shorter development cycles, higher deployment frequency, and more dependable releases that align with corporate objectives and therefore, allow to build enterprise-level applications faster and more efficiently.

service_post.title: How can DevOps Development ensure security?
service_post.content: With shorter development cycles, increased deployment frequency, and more trustworthy releases that correspond with company objectives, the DevOps technique enables faster and more successful product delivery.

service_post.title: What is the limit of Docker scaling?
service_post.content: Containers are used in some of the world's largest server farms today. Container technology is used by large web deployments such as Google and Twitter, which can scale to hundreds of thousands or even millions of containers.

service_post.title: What is the difference between Kubernetes and Docker?
service_post.content: The primary distinction between Kubernetes and Docker is that Kubernetes is designed to run across a cluster, whereas Docker runs on a single node. Kubernetes is more comprehensive than Docker Swarm and is designed to efficiently coordinate clusters of nodes at scale in production.

page.title: CSD Differs From Rest
page.content: With us, you’re guaranteed to work with developers that have experienced the use of modern technologies and the software development process that goes with them. At Dcastalia, we understand your organizational needs and analyze the key-factors that sets you apart from the competitors. As a result of our methodology, we are the finest custom software development company in Bangladesh. This is how we do it. Conceptualization - Firstly, we discuss with our client and try to know more about their business process to understand which model out of many customized ones will be more suited for the client’s needs. Delegation - After talking to our client, identify the project goals and it gets distributed to each member of the team whether it is the designing phase, development phase, or functionality with robust teamwork of testing, security, or other team members. Prototyping - At this stage, our user experience designers prepare a non-functional model which helps us to see the entire solution visually. This is either sketched out or graphically created. Collaboration - When the interface is created, our development team with the client’s feedback, starts working on the system. Delivery - In this phase, the development team fully focuses on the system and implements the functionalities with a method of Agile and in some cases with Waterfall. QA & Integration - In the QA line our team checks each and every function of the working model for bugs and issues. After the issues are resolved, we deliver the project to our client.

page.title: TS Differs From Rest
page.content: With us, you are guaranteed to work with experts that have mastered the use of modern technologies and the technical solution process. At Dcastalia, we understand your industry, communicate your language, and promote your cause in order to deliver an optimum web maintenance service in Bangladesh and assistance to the extent that genuinely meets your requirements. This is how we do it. Conceptualization - Creating customer rapport is our first priority to build trust that goes both ways and discover what exactly the customer wants us to resolve. Analyzing - At this stage, we scrutinize the existing issue, set our scope of work and share it with the client, and set our timeline. Resolving - Once we are done with our research and analysis, we start resolving the problem at the earliest opportunity by implementing the latest and smartest solution. Follow-Up - After successfully providing our support to sort out any bugs or errors, the next follow-up stage where we inform our clients and deliver them an update report regularly.

meta.subtitle: How our technical support and maintenance process differs from the                            rest

page.title: CSD Differs From Rest(copy)6238817
page.content: With us, you’re guaranteed to work with developers that have experienced the use of modern technologies and the software development process that goes with them. At Dcastalia, we understand your industry, communicate your language, and champion your cause to create business software that actually serves your needs. This is how we do it. Conceptualization - Firstly, we discuss with our client and try to know more about their business process to understand which model out of many customized ones will be more suited for the client’s needs. Delegation - After talking to our client, identify the project goals and it gets distributed to each member of the team whether it is the designing phase, development phase, or functionality with robust team work of testing, security, or other team members. Prototyping - At this stage, our user experience designers prepare a non-functional model which helps us to see the entire solution visually. This is either sketched out or graphically created. Collaboration - When the interface is created, our development team with the client’s feedback, starts working on the system. Delivery - In this phase, the development team fully focuses on the system and implements the functionalities with a method of Agile and in some cases with Waterfall. QA & Integration - In the QA line our team checks each and every function of the working model for bugs and issues. After the issues are resolved, we deliver the project to our client.

page.content: Who we are ​Dcastalia Limited operates the site (enter company website here) to provide services including (list business services here. For example: apparel e-commerce, social media, news distribution, investing services, travel booking services, etc.) ​Dcastalia Limited is committed to protecting users' privacy and addressing potential privacy concerns. The following information has been posted to help you, the consumer, understand what private information we collect and how your information is used. Types of private information collected To best serve your needs, we collect the following types of information when you visit (website). Personal information We collect the following personal information from our users: (enter personal information here. Examples: Name Phone number Email address Birthdate Sex Age You can always choose to provide less information. However, omitting some of this personal information may limit your ability to access all of the benefits of our website and services. For example, we will not be able to process transactions without payment information and a billing address, or ship goods without your name and mailing address. Automatically collected information We automatically collect data on how our users visit (enter website here), such as your IP address, location, browser, browser language, operating system, device identifiers, and cookies. Our website currently uses cookies to enhance its functionality. You may disable cookies in your web browser, but this may limit your ability to access (enter website here). Social media information If you've linked your Dcastalia Limited account with a social media account, we also collect information social media networks give us. Depending on the social media network, this can include your username, name, email address, friends list, and more. In addition, we collect demographic data when users interact with Dcastalia Limited social media accounts. Policy on collecting sensitive personal information ​Dcastalia Limited does not gather any of your sensitive personal information, such as your social security number, driver's license number, race, ethnicity, religion, health metrics, political associations, or details on your criminal background. How the information collected is used We only use your personal information to help you utilize everything Dcastalia Limited has to offer. This includes: Creating and maintaining an account with us Completing your transactions Shipping your purchases Fulfilling customer service requests Communicating our sales and promotions Contacting you regarding updates to our company policies Making all of Dcastalia Limited's services available to you in a convenient manner Providing advertisements that are relevant to you as you visit (website) Evaluating analytics to see how our customers engage with (website) (Enter other appropriate actions here) Length of time personal information is stored We may store your personal information for an extended period of time, depending on how we need to use the information. For example, we'll keep your email address and name on file as long as you have an account with us. In addition, we may need to keep your billing information on file for an extended period of time to maintain our internal transaction records. Who the information is shared with We may share your information with third parties, but only those affiliates that Dcastalia Limited has fully vetted and created a partnership with. For more information about our affiliates, please visit this link. The only reason we will ever share your information with affiliates is for the following purposes: (Enter purposes here. Examples include: Processing transactions Fulfilling and delivering orders Measuring marketing and advertising performance Fulfilling customer service requests Providing excellent customer service/li> Issuing email and text message communications Enter other relevant purposes here) Information Security We do our best to keep your private information secure and safe. Most of your personal information is encrypted and is therefore protected from being accessed by outside users. However, data leaks and malicious attacks do happen. Please understand that while we do our best to protect your data, providing your personal information is at your own risk. Ability to decline to provide personal information You can, of course, decline to disclosure your personal information to us. However, the failure to provide us with pertinent information may limit your ability to fully benefit from Dcastalia Limited and all of its offerings. Remember, we only ask for personal information that can help us fully provide our services to our customers. Additional questions If you have questions regarding this privacy policy, feel free to contact us at info@dcastalia.com. page_post.title: How do I know that I need Website Maintenance?
page_post.content: It is said that prevention is better than cure. If your website remains without maintenance then it will soon slow down and will have a negative impact on search results and soon it might break. So, we suggest that you perform regular maintenance on your website as soon as it is launched.

page_post.title: How long does it take to complete website maintenance on my website?
page_post.content: Performing website maintenance is a continuous process. Since the creation of a website, it must go through proper maintenance to function properly. So there is no definite time stamp when your web maintenance will be complete.

page_post.title: Can I upgrade or downgrade my website maintenance plan?
page_post.content: Sure you can. If you want to upgrade/downgrade your maintenance package you can do it whenever you want.

page_post.title: How should I begin with website maintenance services?
page_post.content: Tell us what needs to be changed, and we'll take care of it for you. It's really that simple; a project manager will keep you informed. We will notify you once the work is finished so that you can review the changes and ensure that everything is done to your satisfaction. That's the only thing there is to it! We handle everything so you can concentrate on what's important.

page_post.title: What tools do you use for UI design?
page_post.content: We use Figma and Adobe XD mostly. We also prepare sketches with just pen and paper which might sound primitive but it's effectiveness cannot be denied.

page_post.title: What is the timeline for UX design?
page_post.content: UX Design timeline of a project depends on the scope, project goals, and priorities of key stakeholders involved. It could be done on a single stretch or as phases.

page_post.title: Can you convert the design to WordPress, HTML or CSS?
page_post.content: We certainly can. We provide website design and web development services individually or you can get the whole package which does the UX designing and converts that to a live website.

page_post.title: What are the resources that clients need to provide?
page_post.content: A prospective client must present their organizational goals, functional requirements and technical specifications.

page_post.title: What are the UX design deliverables?
page_post.content: A UX designer produces user-research reports, user persona, customer journey map, sitemaps, wireframes, UI sketch and an interactive prototype.

page_post.title: Overview
page_post.content: We have on board, experienced developers who continuously deliver user-friendly and expertly tailored software based on the business goals that help you surpass your competitors. Alongside, we have worked with a variety of modern frameworks, libraries, tools, and technologies and always stay up-to-date to put together a package that's a good strategic fit for your project. For over a decade we have been working hard to empower and digitally transform organizations while consistently generating value by sharing our skills and passion. This is how we have acquired one of the top places as a Custom Software Development Company in Bangladesh. Being your lifetime digital partner we will listen to you, guide you every step of the way during and after the project, adapt to your changing requirements, and pivot with you when necessary.

page_post.title: Can I make website maintenance changes on my own?
page_post.content: This is determined by the sort of website you have. If your website does not allow you to, we will explore options for converting it to a CMS (Content Management System).

page_post.title: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
page_post.content: Most definitely. We make sure your website is fully responsive and doesn’t break any resolution.

page_post.title: Can the design be made according to my preference?
page_post.content: Yes, the design will be made keeping your preference and choice in mind so that we can deliver the best results.

page_post.title: What if I am not happy with the design?
page_post.content: If you are not satisfied with the design, we will redesign the website according to your preference. We also have an extensive collection of design templates for you to choose from.

page_post.title: Which platform do you use to develop the website?
page_post.content: We use modern technologies like Laravel, NodeJS, AngularJS, and many more, which are appropriate for fulfilling the design and functional requirements of the website.

page_post.title: Is there any hidden cost associated with the service?
page_post.content: No, there are no hidden costs involved. We are an honest and transparent digital agency, and the services we provide reflect that.

page_post.title: Can you help with an existing website?
page_post.content: Yes! We work on existing websites, but we recommend building the site from one source only as it ensures the stability of the website’s performance.

page_post.title: What is WordPress?
page_post.content: WordPress is a blogging and content management system that is open source and was released in 2003. It is now the most widely used blogging platform on the internet and its CMS powers over 35% of websites on the internet.

page_post.title: What do I need to provide to start building a site with WordPress?
page_post.content: To kickstart your project and in order for it to run smoothly you can help us initially by providing the website assets (logo, content, images etc), your existing domain if you have any, CSM or web host login, and the rest can be discussed in the initial meeting.

page_post.title: Is WordPress Secure?
page_post.content: WordPress is updated four to eight times a year, which is more frequent than typical software. Regular updates improve the security of WordPress websites and ensure that the most recent version is used.

page_post.title: Can I easily edit everything in WordPress?
page_post.content: WordPress has been created with non-technical users in mind. Changing font sizes and colors, altering navigation, building new web pages, incorporating photos, and embedding video is all simple tasks with this CMS. To take it a step further, Dcastalia provides each customer with a personalized website manual and free consulting that contains precise "how-tos" for upgrading the WordPress website once it has been developed.

page_post.title: What kind of license does WordPress have?
page_post.content: The General Public License (GNU) is used to license WordPress. This is an open-source license, which means anyone can edit and redistribute the source code.

page_post.title: Will you be able to upgrade an existing software? What do I have to provide?
page_post.content: Sure we can. We need the codes and all the files of your previous project and we can upgrade it as per your requirements.

page_post.title: Will our information be secure?
page_post.content: Yes, your data is completely safe and protected, and only the people you choose from inside your company have access to it. Apart from that, the data is stored in databases and transmitted between the server and your computer in an encrypted format. To ensure this, several security audits and assessments will be conducted.

page_post.title: Would I need to make any changes to my existing systems for business automation?
page_post.content: Yes, you can upgrade your current system to use automation. We need the codes and all the files of your previous project and we can upgrade it as per your requirements.

page_post.title: What should I expect as a result of introducing Business Automation?
page_post.content: Although the results differ depending on the type of implementation, processes involved, and department, productivity is the most significant driving force behind any Business Automation implementation. However, according to experience and research, you can predict the following outcomes: – Lower costs – Higher productivity – Consistent output

page_post.title: I am not a technical person, will you manage my ecommerce site?

page_post.title: How much does it cost to develop an ecommerce app?

page_post.title: Do you provide custom designs for e-commerce developments?

page_post.title: What is DevOps?
page_post.content: DevOps is a software development process that builds a bridge between the development team and the operations team for continuous and rapid delivery.

page_post.title: How can a business benefit from DevOps?
page_post.content: DevOps technique enables faster and more effective product delivery with shorter development cycles, higher deployment frequency, and more dependable releases that align with corporate objectives and therefore, allow to build enterprise-level applications faster and more efficiently.

page_post.title: How can DevOps Development ensure security?
page_post.content: With shorter development cycles, increased deployment frequency, and more trustworthy releases that correspond with company objectives, the DevOps technique enables faster and more successful product delivery.

page_post.title: What is the limit of Docker scaling?
page_post.content: Containers are used in some of the world's largest server farms today. Container technology is used by large web deployments such as Google and Twitter, which can scale to hundreds of thousands or even millions of containers.

page_post.title: What is the difference between Kubernetes and Docker?
page_post.content: The primary distinction between Kubernetes and Docker is that Kubernetes is designed to run across a cluster, whereas Docker runs on a single node. Kubernetes is more comprehensive than Docker Swarm and is designed to efficiently coordinate clusters of nodes at scale in production.

page_post.title: What is the cost of the DevOps service?
page_post.content: DevOps service costs vary depending on a number of criteria, including the size and type of firm. Please contact us right away if you have any questions about the cost.

page_post.title: How much time does it take to deploy an application through DevOps?
page_post.content: The time it will take to deploy an enterprise application will be less than classical methods by the use of DevOps, however, the exact time will depend on the size of the business.

page_post.title: What types of apps do you develop?
page_post.content: We develop apps for both Web and Mobile platforms.

page_post.title: Is it necessary for me to test my app?
page_post.content: We have an in-house testing team that will work with the developers to validate the device. Your feedback is very important to ensure the best quality for the app.

page_post.title: What if I need assistance on the app after it is launched?
page_post.content: We provide help with maintaining the app even after it is launched to help you to be on board and take control, and this is what makes us the leading app design agency in Bangladesh.

page_post.title: Will I own the source code?
page_post.content: Yes. After the development process is complete, we will provide you with the source code if you need it.

page_post.title: What does it cost to develop an app?
page_post.content: The cost will depend on the technical requirements and specifications, the technology to be used etc. However, it can also be customized according to your budget.

Conceptualization
page_post.content: Firstly, we discuss with our client and try to know more about their business process to understand which model out of many customized ones will be more suited for the client’s needs.

page_post.title: Delegation
page_post.content: After talking to our client, identify the project goals and it gets distributed to each member of the team whether it is the designing phase, development phase, or functionality with robust teamwork of testing, security, or other team members.

page_post.title: Prototyping
page_post.content: At this stage, our user experience designers prepare a non-functional model which helps us to see the entire solution visually. This is either sketched out or graphically created.

page_post.title: Collaboration
page_post.content: When the interface is created, our development team with the client’s feedback, starts working on the system.

page_post.title: Delivery
page_post.content: In this phase, the development team fully focuses on the system and implements the functionalities with a method of Agile and in some cases with Waterfall.

page_post.title: QA & Integration
page_post.content: In the QA line our team checks each and every function of the working model for bugs and issues. After the issues are resolved, we deliver the project to our client.
